text: Isabel María Josefina Robalino Bolle (14 October 1917 – 31 January 2022) was a Spanish-born Ecuadorian lawyer and politician. She was born in Barcelona, Spain. She was a Senator from 1968 until 1970. Robalino turned 100 in October 2017. She died on 31 January 2022 in Quito, Ecuador, at the age of 104. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ecuadorian politicians Category:Centenarians Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Spanish politicians
title: Isabel Robalino
